question: Which university announced exemption of fees for its transgender students of all programmes?
explanation: The Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU) on Sunday announced exemption of fees for its transgender students of all programmes. The university holds the lecture on 2 July every year in the memory of the founding Vice Chancellor of the university professor G Ram Reddy. It invites eminent educationists and scholars to deliver lectures on higher education, especially in the open and distance learning domain.
